price: (20) Not equal are the companions of the Fire and the companions of Paradise. The companions of Paradise - they are the attainers [of success].
arabic: لَا يَسۡتَوِيٓ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ وَأَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِۚ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ هُمُ ٱلۡفَآئِزُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: lā yastawī aṣḥābu al-nāri wa-aṣḥābu al-janati aṣḥābu al-janati humu al-fāizūna
